basic.blooming: Flowering period May-August, fruiting period July-September
basic.color: Flower color purple, fruit color black or black brown

maintenance.soil: Peat or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 5.5-7.5
maintenance.sunlight: Like adequate light, avoid too strong light in summer
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly when soil is dry, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead, rotten, diseased leaves timely
